blogPost.excerpt: Not very popular on Twitter? Prefer Android to iPhone? At Scrubhouse, we've got you covered! Come join the conversation with the rest of us.
blogPost.body: Not very popular on Twitter? Prefer Android to iPhone? At Scrubhouse, we've got you covered! Come join the conversation with the rest of us.
blogPost.title: Scrubhouse - Drop-in audio chat for the rest of us
blogPost.author: John Keck

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受欢迎？更喜欢Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我们已经为你准备好了! 快来加入我们的对话。
localize.tagline: 我们其余人的即时语音聊天

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受歡迎？更喜歡Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我們已經爲你準備好了! 快來加入我們的對話。
localize.tagline: 我們其餘人的即時語音聊天

previous.excerpt: Meditation apps are great but they don’t address real world events and situations. I curse. You curse. Why shouldn’t your meditations? We recorded some oddly specific meditations for your peace of mind. Presenting MindF*** from the makers at Bad Unicorn 🦄
previous.title: MindF*** - It’s like Headspace but with occasional profanity 🙉

localize.description: 冥想应用程序是伟大的，但他们不解决现实世界的事件和情况。我诅咒。你也会诅咒。为什么你的冥想不应该？我们录制了一些奇特的冥想，让你心安理得。呈现MindF***来自Bad Unicorn的制作者 🦄。
localize.tagline: 这就像Headspace，但偶尔会有脏话🙉。

localize.description: 冥想應用程序是偉大的，但他們不解決現實世界的事件和情況。我詛咒。你也會詛咒。爲什麼你的冥想不應該？我們錄製了一些奇特的冥想，讓你心安理得。呈現MindF***來自Bad Unicorn的製作者 🦄。
localize.tagline: 這就像Headspace，但偶爾會有髒話🙉。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 6% over the past week, the 65th consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 73% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/nJz69uqnQR

localize.full_text: 过去一周美国科维德-19住院人数下降6%，这是连续第65天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/nJz69uqnQR。
過去一週美國科維德-19住院人數下降6%，這是連續第65天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/nJz69uqnQR。
